column5: Comfy queen bed, the coziness, the relaxed, quiet atmosphere, the wifi and networked printer, morning coffee or tea, scenic yard, yoga equipment, & whole house access have my home a well-liked destination. Pack n Play for yg child. Well-equipped kitchen with pantry space for your non-perishables. Guest refrigerator and recycling area. Pool access 9 mos/year. Couples, solo. GLBTQ, \
column8: Quiet, Comfy Room in Well-placed Home
